entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Stirling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:07 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 2:53 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

Temperature: -7.2°C

Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -8.2°C

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 50 gusting to 90 late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
